props.name: alertType
props.docblock: specifies the type of alert that is being diplayed. It defaults to "warning".  See the other available [bootstrap](https://v4-alpha.getbootstrap.com/components/alerts/) options.

description.text: specifies the type of alert that is being diplayed. It defaults to "warning".  See the other available [bootstrap](https://v4-alpha.getbootstrap.com/components/alerts/) options.

props.name: className
props.docblock: is a string array that defines the classes to be used within the status alert.

description.text: is a string array that defines the classes to be used within the status alert.

props.name: dismissible
props.docblock: specifies if the status alert will include the dismissible X button to close the alert. It defaults to true.

description.text: specifies if the status alert will include the dismissible X button to close the alert. It defaults to true.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: is a function that is called on close. It can be used to perform actions upon closing of the status alert, such as restoring focus to the previous logical focusable element.  It is only required if `dismissible` is set to `true` and not required if the alert is not `dismissible`.

description.text: is a function that is called on close. It can be used to perform actions upon closing of the status alert, such as restoring focus to the previous logical focusable element.  It is only required if `dismissible` is set to `true` and not required if the alert is not `dismissible`.

props.name: open
props.docblock: specifies whether the status alert renders open or closed on the initial render. It defaults to false.

description.text: specifies whether the status alert renders open or closed on the initial render. It defaults to false.
